name: Dont Touch My Game
description: This is my game Dont Touch My Game and it is a game where you have to try and run away from your enemys,  get food and  cleaners. The cleaner takes all the enemys away but if you eat food they come back. You can get lives sometimes, touching an enemy will make you lose a life. If you run out of lives you die. You can also collect coins and everytime you play try and beat your score from before. There are also sheilds that protect you from you enemy so if you run into one you wont die but if you dont have a sheilds you will lose a life.
